abstract: eBuddy wants to be the lingua franca of Web- and mobile-based instant messaging. A start-up, eBuddy offers a Web-based instant messenger that allows people to chat on any of the AOL, Google Talk, MSN, MySpace, and Yahoo Messenger clients.
lead_paragraph: eBuddy wants to be the lingua franca of Web- and mobile-based instant messaging. A start-up, eBuddy offers a Web-based instant messenger that allows people to chat on any of the AOL, Google Talk, MSN, MySpace, and Yahoo Messenger clients.
